Pre-Game Insights: The game between the Cleveland Guardians and Chicago White Sox is scheduled for September 11, 2024, at Guaranteed Rate Field in Chicago, IL.
The pitchers taking the mound will be Matthew Boyd for the Chicago White Sox and Davis Martin for the Cleveland Guardians.
The Cleveland Guardians have a team slugging percentage of .396 and have hit 166 home runs this season.
The Chicago White Sox have a team slugging percentage of .340 and have hit 115 home runs this season.
The Cleveland Guardians are averaging 4.5 runs per game, while the Chicago White Sox are averaging 3.08 runs per game.
The Cleveland Guardians' pitching staff has a team ERA of 3.81, while the Chicago White Sox's pitching staff has a team ERA of 4.85.
